definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.chinese: 後脣瓣花絲無齒的在基部。

sentences.english: It is an annual with ovate stipules and a glabrous filament tube.
sentences.chinese: 它是一年生草本，具卵形托葉和無毛的花絲筒部。

sentences.english: Corollaceous weak pink, inside have purple spot, staminal filament does not have wool.
sentences.chinese: 花冠淡粉紅色，內間有紫色斑點，雄蕊花絲無毛。

sentences.english: Stamens ca. 3 mm, papillate -hairy on lower part of filament.
sentences.chinese: 雄蕊約3毫米，在花絲的下半部分上具乳突有毛。

sentences.english: The thread in the corolla is the short filament of a degenerated stamen.
sentences.chinese: 花冠筒內絲狀物爲退化雄蕊的短花絲。

sentences.english: This blown-up filigree is the result of a study of infinite patterns.
sentences.chinese: 巨型花絲是來自於對分形算法的研究。

sentences.english: The trend in different position of cob was accord with the silk.
sentences.chinese: 不同部位的穗軸和花絲中變化趨勢一致。

sentences.english: HE red violin bow horns against high tail end of libraries around the filaments.
sentences.chinese: 高檔蘇木小提琴弓價格紅牛角尾庫高檔馬尾繞花絲。

definition: red coral/precious coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)
item made from woven silk or rayon
Jiguan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
